## Options.locales property

The locales to use to split the text. You can find more details at [the Intl reference page](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Intl#locales_argument)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
locales?: Intl.LocalesArgument;
```
